title: Tasty Udon Chicken Noodles Soup Recipe
content:
Delicious hot and sour chicken soup with those thick udon noodles. It is so filling and is so delicious too. You can enjoy this soup on cold days.

 

Udon Chicken Noodles Soup Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 15 mins

Total time: 25 mins

 

Recipe type: Soup

Cuisine: Chinese

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Udon Noodles - 100 grams

Chicken with Bones - 500 grams

Carrot - 1 grated

Cabbage - 1 cup chopped finely

Soya Sauce - 2 teaspoon

Salt to taste

Sugar - 1 teaspoon

Vinegar to taste

Cornflour / Cornstarch - 1 tablespoon

Black Pepper to taste

 

Instructions

Cook udon noodles as per package directions. Drain them and divide it between serving bowls.

Take chicken in a pot, cover with water and cook till chicken is tender.

Now drain the chicken and remove flesh from it.

Now add carrot and cabbage to the chicken and cook till the veggies are done.

Add salt, soy sauce, sugar, pepper, and vinegar.

Add in cornflour mixed with little water. Mix well so the soup gets thick.

Now Pour the soup over the noodles and serve.

recommendations.title: Tasty Kuttanadan Chicken Curry Recipe
recommendations.content:

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
